title: i cant login
body:
every time when i try to login i get conection faliure 


how can i fix it pls i need help

replies.body:
Login connection failures are often the result of security or network settings that prevent the client from properly communicating with the login service. Our [Login Issues guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201761944-Login-Issues) is a great place to start in resolving this. 

Let me know if you still have issues after working through those steps.
